maqras.text: Recite pro them history Noah. He dictus to his people O my people vos invenit my position my reminding vos de deus revelations too much vos tunc ego put my trust DEUS! Vos get unus tuus dux agree on ultimus decision yourselves tunc let me know it sine delay
Vos turn tunc ego non asked vos any wage My wage advenit ex DEUS. Ego commanded est submitter
They rejected eum consequently nos saved eum those ligatus eum ark; nos factus them inheritors. Nos drowned those rejected noster revelations. Note consequences; they warned
Tunc nos sent eum messengers their people they showed them clear proofs they non est believe in quod they rejected in the elapsus. Nos sic sigillum hearts transgressors
Tunc nos sent them Moses Aaron Pharaoh his group noster proofs Autem they turned arrogant; transgressing people
When truth advenit them nos they dictus Hoc est obviously magic
Moses dictus hoc quam vos describe truth when it Est advenit vos? est hoc magic Quam any magicians prevail
They dictus vos advenit divert nos ex quod nos invenit noster parentes perfecit attain positions de prominence yourselves? Nos nunquam ligatus vos prout believers
Pharaoh dictus Bring me omnis experienced magician
When magicians advenit Moses dictus to them Throw whatever vos throw
When they threw Moses dictus Quod vos produced est magic DEUS testimentum factus it fail DEUS NON support transgressors' work
DEUS establishes truth His words criminals
Nullus believed Moses absque ut few de his people dum fearing tyranny Pharaoh his senior! Surely Pharaoh est much too arrogant terra real tyrant
Moses dictus O my people vos habet really believed in DEUS tunc put tuus trust Eum vos est really submitters
They dictus Nos trust DEUS. Noster Dominus save nos ex persecution these oppressive people
Deliver nos cum Tuus mercy ex disbelieving people
Nos inspired Moses his frater. Maintain tuus domus Egypt pro the temporis est turn tuus domus into synagogues maintain Contact Prayers (Salat)! Dedit bonus news believers

Moses dictus Noster Dominus vos dedit Pharaoh his senior luxuries wealth in hoc saeculum! Noster Dominus they unus use them repulse others Tuus path. Noster Dominus wipe out their wealth harden their hearts prevent them ex believing dum they vide painful retribution
(He dictus Tuus prayer answered O Moses Aaron) est steadfast non subsequentis via de those non know
